alert.note: Alert for Hansford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 12:16AM CDT until June 12 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TEXAS AND NORTHERN HANSFORD COUNTIES... At 1216 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Gruver, or 18 miles south of Guymon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Goodwell and Hardesty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
